name: test_log_rotation
description: Test the log rotation of text files.
descriptionHtml: Test the log rotation of text files.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: ❌ files other than log files exist ['drwxrwx--- 2 mysql mysql  4096 Jul 14 01:45 archive_error', '-rw------- 1  1001 584789   19 Jul 14 01:45 error.log', '-rw------- 1  1001 584789   21 Jul 14 01:45 general.log']
assert 3 == 2
 +  where 3 = len(['drwxrwx--- 2 mysql mysql  4096 Jul 14 01:45 archive_error', '-rw------- 1  1001 584789   19 Jul 14 01:45 error.log', '-rw------- 1  1001 584789   21 Jul 14 01:45 general.log'])
 +  and   2 = len(['error.log', 'general.log'])
